value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI. value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript

value.title: Are you thinking about your tooltips in Power BI?
value.excerpt: The base tooltips in Power BI are fine. But are you overusing them? Adding everything to them in your visuals? Adam gives you some things to think about with your tooltips!
